text: @piersmorgan The spokes man for boris just said ' it was about a 4 year old girl ' even though his wife had coronavirus . He risked giving the virus to his elderly perants . Cummings is arrogant ' Every body out know we all know people in need . If ministers break the rule 'WHY NOT US .
